thread.title: Changes to the National Lottery come into play next weekend
thread.title_full: Changes to the National Lottery come into play next weekend

author: JamesCrawley
title: Changes to the National Lottery come into play next weekend
text:
Changes to the National Lottery come into play next weekend By JamesCrawley | Posted: October 04, 2015 TNL_LOTTO_Regular_Standard_Use_FC_CMYK Changes to the National Lottery come into play next weekend X 
Copy link to paste in your message / 
It's all change for the National Lottery next weekend. 
There will be more winners and millionaires made who play the Lotto. 
The changes come into effect for next Saturday's Lotto (October 10) and tickets will be on sale from Thursday. Plus it will continue to be £2 to play. 
What are the changes? One person guaranteed £1million in every draw 20 prizes of £20,000 Match two numbers to be given a free Lotto lucky dip Bigger rolling jackpots Numbers increasing from 49 to 59 
Before then, Lotto returns on Wednesday with a jackpot of £4.3million.
